Title: The Third Polaroid
Writer: Brian Yorkey, Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Kirk A. Moore (executive story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Alex blows up at Bryce. Someone blackmails Marcus. Clay testifies about the night he and Hannah spent together. Jessica experiences a flashback.
